title: Proactive Marketing & Funnel Specialist (Full-Time, AI-Savvy)
job_overview:
Job Overview:

Leading UK based business is looking for a self-motivated, AI-savvy marketing & funnel specialist to help us run and grow our digital business.

You’ll take my goals and ideas, and turn them into action — proposing solutions, building the systems, and reporting back on progress.

You’re expected to use AI tools (like ChatGPT, Claude, etc.) intelligently to help you work faster and more effectively.


???? Responsibilities:

 • Plan & implement sales funnels: sales page, emails, checkout, course delivery.
 • Write & design (with AI tools) sales pages, emails, and social ads.
 • Run social media ads & retargeting campaigns.
 • Set up lead magnets, opt-in pages, surveys & email sequences.
 • Maintain Shopify listings, pre-sale campaigns & product launches.
 • Create downloadable templates, images, and videos for promotion.
 • Set up post-purchase tagging, surveys & review collection using Zapier & Blastable.
 • Install & monitor tracking tools (GA4, TruConversion) and optimise results.
 • Manage and post on social media regularly.
 • Report weekly on completed tasks, upcoming plans & suggested improvements.



???? Tools You Should Know (or Learn Quickly):

 • Thrive Architect, ThriveCart, Thrive Apprentice
 • Blastable (email), Shopify, Zapier
 • GA4, TruConversion
 • AI tools: ChatGPT, Claude, Canva, etc.


???? Qualifications:

 • Strong experience with sales funnels, email automation & social ads.
 • Excellent written & spoken English.
 • Confident using AI tools intelligently to improve speed & quality.
 • Able to learn tools and solve problems without being micro-managed.
 • Organised, reliable & communicative.

???? Important:

 • Working Hours are 09:00 - 17:00 GMT/BST (UK TIme)


???? How to Apply:

Please send:

 • A short introduction & why you’re a good fit.
 • Examples of funnels/campaigns you’ve built or managed.
 • Your expected monthly salary in PHP and preferred working hours.
 • Confirmation that you’re comfortable and experienced using AI tools in your work.

If successful, the candidate will be invited to participate in video screening via HireVire.
